website_summaries.verdict: A speedy, budget-friendly RC boat with self-righting features. Perfect for beginners.
pros: Comes with spare propeller and 2 rechargeable batteries
cons: Turning mechanism could use more precision
Battery life is a bit short

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My grandson really enjoys this boat battery life only lasts for about 10 minutes which I guess that is normal I bought 2 more batteries so he can get more run time
customer_reviews.author: Maa

customer_reviews.title: Returned it.
customer_reviews.text: The nose/bow would plow under water and not go very fast. It did seem to keep the water out of the battery compartment unlike another we purchased. With 2 tries at very similar items , we are not going to try again.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: A year later and it's still working.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to a great nephew last year for Christmas. They live on a lake, and I just learned that he still takes it down to the dock and plays with it. That tells me that it's pretty sturdy if it is still working after almost a year.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hammer

customer_reviews.title: top notch boat

customer_reviews.title: Broken Hull Cover Clip/Pin
customer_reviews.text: The boat actually ran great and I would like to improve my review, but I used the boat twice and the clip/pin that keeps the top on the hull has broken. Does anybody know how I can replace this piece?

customer_reviews.text: It only comes with one battery and it does not last long.

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great value toy. We bought 2 and the kids run them constantly. Get an extra better

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work at all
customer_reviews.text: Remote just sits there beeping incessantly. The instructions don't offer any real help. It should Just Work. But it's completely non responsive to the controls. Dead as a doornail. Battery is fully charged. Ended up with one very disappointed 10 year old girl. :(
customer_reviews.author: UnaClocker

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is built with amazing quality for the price, I have bought 300 dollar boats that break after a year of use, not only that but this boat goes faster then normal. This product has lasted me over 3 years of fun, I also let my kids drive this boat, they have crashed it into rocks and bashed this boat like heck but it is still holding up and is working as good as new. If you are looking to get into the hobby or just get a cheaper boat for fun I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Smeles
